unnormalised: Arey yaar, mhozo kaka Rakesh Gurgaontlo, purnnponnan fattavo gelelo purnnea satolleant. Tannem Jio koddlean fonkat data mellttalim mhunn ek WhatsApp forvaddantlea linkacher click kelem. Magir zanna asa tumkam, tachem bank account rekteam zalem! Tannem sumar Rs. 50,000 harpale! Cyber police-anim tankam sanglam ki to phishing scam aslo ani oxem sodanch zata. Te sangtale ki tannem tachea accountacher 2FA chaluch dovrunk zai aslem ani ken'nach vollkh nasl'lea linkancher click korunk favo naslem. Atam to chintit asa ani sodanch mhunntta "kya zamana aa gaya hai!" To aaz FIR bhorta, asta ki taka tache kaim poixe portun mellttat mhunn.
normalised: Arre yaar, mhozo mama Rakesh Gurgaovnchea, purnnent fattkori poddlo pichle hatevdyak. Tannem Jio-chea fukot data viximchea WhatsApp-antlean ailelea ek link-acher click kelem. Magir taka koll’llea xivai, tachem bank account rikteam kelem! Tannem sumar rupya ponchash hazar ghaloyle! Cyber policeni taka sangllem ki tem ek phishing fattkori aslem ani he vostu sadharanponnan ghoddttat. Tannim sangllem ki tannem tachea account-acher don F-A chalu dovornnache asle ani ken’nanch olkhinaslilea link-ancher click korche nhoi. Atam to chintit asa ani sodanch mhonta “kya zamana aa gaya hai!” To aiz F-I-R bhorta, asa dit mhozo dud porot melltolo mhunn.
text: Arey yaar, mhozo kaka Rakesh Gurgaontlo, purnnponnan fattavo gelelo purnnea satolleant. Tannem Jio koddlean fonkat data mellttalim mhunn ek WhatsApp forvaddantlea linkacher click kelem. Magir zanna asa tumkam, tachem bank account rekteam zalem! Tannem sumar Rs. 50,000 harpale! Cyber police-anim tankam sanglam ki to phishing scam aslo ani oxem sodanch zata. Te sangtale ki tannem tachea accountacher 2FA chaluch dovrunk zai aslem ani ken'nach vollkh nasl'lea linkancher click korunk favo naslem. Atam to chintit asa ani sodanch mhunntta "kya zamana aa gaya hai!" To aaz FIR bhorta, asta ki taka tache kaim poixe portun mellttat mhunn.
